alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 4:16AM EST until January 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and/or snowmelt and/or ice jams continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois, including the following areas, Eastern Will, Ford, Grundy, Iroquois, Kankakee, La Salle, Livingston and Southern Will and northwest Indiana, including the following areas, Benton, Jasper, Lake IN, Newton and Porter. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Storm drains and ditches may be clogged with snow and ice, increasing the risk of flooding. Localized water level fluctuations possible due to an ice jam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Watch means flooding is possible, but not yet certain, based upon the latest forecasts. Persons with interests along area rivers, creeks, and other waterways should monitor the latest forecasts and be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
